body_html:
Just a heads up. I don't think this is fixed with the newest tag 1.5.0-rc1, you've still gotta make the symbolic link before using bazel to build.

This is on ubuntu16.04 with:
Bazel 0.9
CudaNN 7.0.5
Cuda9.1

body:
Just a heads up. I don't think this is fixed with the newest tag 1.5.0-rc1, you've still gotta make the symbolic link before using bazel to build.

This is on ubuntu16.04 with:
Bazel 0.9 
CudaNN 7.0.5
Cuda9.1
